title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Meet the everyday essential that quietly does it all. Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags combine tough, tear-resistant performance with easy, reliable handling—perfect for busy kitchens, offices, and households.

- Strong where it counts: Flex‑tra strength stretches to resist rips, punctures, and leaks, so you can load up leftovers, cans, and everyday messes with confidence.
- Just the right fit: 13-gallon capacity fits most tall kitchen cans, helping you keep things neat without overhang or wasted space.
- Clean and simple: Unscented design is great for scent-sensitive households while still locking in everyday odors.
- Easy to close, easy to carry: Sturdy red drawstring makes cinching, lifting, and taking out the trash quick and mess-free.
- Crisp, clean look: White, tear-resistant plastic keeps contents discreet and your kitchen looking tidy.
- Smart convenience: Compatible with Alexa Voice Shopping—reorder with a simple voice command when you’re running low.
- Great value: 50-count pack keeps you stocked without extra trips to the store.

Upgrade your trash routine with dependable strength, a perfect fit, and effortless carry—Amazon Basics Flextra bags make cleanup one less thing to think about.
